name: Bob's Sperm Survival
description:
THE FIRST GAME OF FENEZIS & MHEEY

*Please acknowledge that both developers have less than a fortnight of experience.*

What will you do if you know you will be terminated within a few hours? Spermy thinks it is unacceptable. Now it's your duty to help him fulfill his dream of seeing the outside world!

  • Experience a short adventure in the vas deferens
  • Two small cutscenes to get you into the story
  • Easy gameplay
  • Self-made sound effects
  • A comedy game you'll never forget
  • A speedrun timer (coming soon)

This game is submitted to Newbie Game Jam 2022-1 by Kosmotion.

THANK YOU FOR PLAYING!

(Comments from you all will be very appreciated.)

Updates

3 May 2022 : Difficulty adjustments
